name: Caves And ladders
description:
Run away from the ghost by climbing up ladders and sliding down worms!

click on dice to get a random amount of gold!

Press E on the Caves to teleport!

goal is to get as much gold as possible before your time runs out!

bugs- 

teleport sometimes bugs out

dont go out of screen bounds

to be added- 

new dice features like changing the layout of level and giving extra time

high score
